message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item has been meticulously crafted and tailored to provide unparalleled value to its users. Given its unique features and high-quality materials, we believe it's worth more than $12,000. However, I understand that everyone has different budgets and priorities. To make this opportunity accessible, I am offering you the chance to own this product for $12,000. This price includes not only the product itself but also a comprehensive warranty and exceptional customer support. I'm confident that you'll find the investment in this product to be highly beneficial. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details. I look forward to your positive response.
